9-10 Agt 2024 Hotel ini berada di area Pusat Perbelanjaan Pascal 23 Hyper Square (Mall). Namanya unik 'Yello Hotel' gak pakai 'w'. Apa keunikannya? Masuk hotel ambil karcis parkir, sambil melihat lihat keadaan keberadaan letak hotel. Ternyata posisinya langsung kelihatan lurus, masuk ke basement dan harus men scan barcode pada tiket tadi. Karena keberadaan hotel ini menyatu dengan pusat perbelanjaan, agak lama mencari cari parkir mobil. Jika barang bawaan banyak, alangkah baiknya menurunkan barang tadi persis di depan lobby hotel yang ada di basement, karena kemungkinan dapat parkiran letaknya jauh dari hotel. Hotel ini di lantai 4. Dibawahnya itu mall. Naik melalui lift lantai 4. Setelah tiba di lantai 4 terlihat nuansa kuning pada meja dinding dan lampu resepsionisnya. Jadi uniknya hanya warna kuning ini aja kali ya, ditambah juga ada hiasan pada langit langit. Di lantai ini juga ada tempat bermain anak atau ruang 'Game On' Cek in ke resepsionis, dikasih kartu kunci satu, katanya kunci satunya lagi sudah nempel di kamar. Dapat kamar nomor cantik 606. Disini juga tersedia welcome drink air infusan dan teh manis, tersedia juga kripik pisang. Ambil sendiri ya. Lift kamar berbeda dengan lift yang tadi. Pemandangan kamar berhadapan dengan hotel fave. Masih terlihat juga sedikit pemandangan alamnya. Ternyata di dalam kamar juga bernuansa kuning. Di dalam kamar tersedia dua botol air minum dalam botol, namun masih disediakan juga dua botol dalam kemasan botol plastik. Kamar ini type urban, tidak terlalu luas, di sediakan snak dan tiga buah segar apel, jeruk dan kiwi. Kamar mandinya dengan pintu geser dan dikamar bilas dengan air pancuran yang cukup deras dan dilengkapi dengan pintu kaca. Jadi air tidak terlalu terpercik keluar. Selain handuk disediakan juga hand towel Resto di lantai 4, tempatnya luas, ada juga di luar. Makanannya enak dan bervariasi, ada soto Bandung, bakso cuanki. Kolam renang di lantai 4, dengan kolam anak dan dewasa, disini juga ada lapangan mini basket. Airnya dingin ya. Waktunya pulang, cekout ke resepsionis, serahkan kunci kamar dan ambil mobil di basement, ke lobbynta untuk mengangkut kembali barang bawaan. Dari basement karcis tadi di tempelkan lalu portal ke buka, dan cari pintu keluar berikutnya, tadinya masih agak bingung karena masih ada portal berikutnya, bingung karcis parkir yang mana lagi harus ditempelkan. Lalu teringat karcis yang sama dengan karcis hotel. Baru akhirnya bisa keluar dari area pusat perbelanjaan. Secara keseluruhan hotel ini asyik, berada di pusat perbelanjaan dan makanannya pun enak enak.

Hotel yg cukup murah dengan banyak keuntungan. Bukan karna fasilitas yg melimpah Tapi lokasinya yg dipusat kota bahkan diatas mall membuat seakan seisi mall jadi fasilitasnya. Great hotel with great service. The Receptionist and the Housekeeping staff are friendly and helpful. Make you feel really like at home. The AC works fine and the hot water always runs. You need to hold the shower handle at all times and when you put it back it easily gets off and falls. Keep up the good work, Yello Hotel!

Hotel nya menjadi satu dengan mall Paskal 23, sehingga sangat nyaman. Kamar cukup lega dan kualitas bedding cukup baik. Akan lebih optimal apabila pillow ditambah kuantitasnya. Tersedia sofa bed dengan glass window besar menghadap ke luar hotel, sehingga view dari lantai atas sangat menarik. Tidak disediakan lemari secara spesifik, namun sebagai gantinya terdapat kompartemen untuk menaruh tas dan menggantung pakaian. Kamar mandi cukup bersih dan nyaman. Kondisi penerangan sangat baik. Seingat saya tidak tersedia kulkas, namun terdapat brankas di kamar. Kolam renang terletak selandia dengan lobby, dengan ukuran yang tidak terlalu besar. Selain itu tersedia area permainan di dekat lobby yang menyediakan iPad dan Xbox. Area lobby luas dan nyaman. Restoran cukup lega, dengan pilihan variasi menu yang beragam dan rasa yang enak. Koridor ke arah kamar cukup menarik desain nya. Secara keseluruhan, hotel ini sangat nyaman untuk berlibur. Satu permasalahan akses yang saya alami, lokasi nya terletak di daerah padat.

Hotel yg langsung menuju ke mall paskal 23. Tempatnya artistik banget, bahkan ada game room. Makanannya enak2. Ada kolam renang dengan view kece. Staff nya juga ramah. Satpamnya baik, langsung bantuin kalau kita perlu. Cocok buat staycation keluarga.

Lokasi Hotel sangat strategis karena terletak di atas Pascal Hipersquare mall dan juga dekat dengan stasiun kereta api. Tempat yang nyaman untuk menginap. Kamar yg bersih dan luas dengan fasilitas yang sangat memadai . Kamar mandi nya juga bersih dan tidak luma menu sarapan yang bervariasi. Terdapat kolam renang juga... Nice...

Hotel location was super strategic, the entrance is attached to Paskal Shopping Centre Cai Lobby Entrance, so literally a walk to the mall. Staff hospitality was super gpod, theyre very helpful, super accomodative. The room was incredible as well, big bed, cozy lighting and complete amenities. I got extra breakfast voucher and coffee as well which is very nice. Hotel facility was enough with pool and game room, their breakfast menu is really good and deli as well. We're enjoying every bite. Very recommended for the tourist since the location is strategic to bandung entertainment centre, close to the train station as well.

Untuk hotel budget, tempatnya cukup cozy dan tematik dengan street art dan image youthful nya. Space per kamar lumayan luas bila dibandingkan hotel lain dengan price range yang sama. Bahkan ada sofa panjangnya, yang bersebelahan dengan jendela kamarnya yang besar, jadi bisa duduk2 sambil liatin pemandangan keluar. Hanya saja mungkin karena lantainya gak pake karpet dan langit2nya agak tinggi jadi kalo ngobrol agak bergema. Tapi hal tersebut tidak terlalu mengurangi pengalaman kami menginap disini. Recommended hotel deh.

Proses check in lama sekali, baru dapat kamar jam 5 sore. Untung lokasi dibawahnya mall jadi bisa nunggu di mall.kamarnya luas, ada sofa. Kebersihan kamar ok, amnetis dan keramahan staff baik, rasa menu sarapan kurang, semoga bisa ditingkatkan khususnya utk proses check in agar tdk menunggu lama

Ada beberapa pilihan kamar. Untuk breakfast menurut aku seadanya sesuai harga. Staffnya ramah & komunikatif. Di lobby ada xbox & 2 tablet yang bisa digunakan gratis. Untuk keluar disarankan memakai pintu keluar yang di kebon jati yang dijaga orang supaya tiket parkir bebas biaya bisa digunakan.

Hotelnya bagus, bangunannya baru. Kamarnya bersih dan nyaman, designnya unik. Ada brangkas, pemandangan diluar kamar juga bagus. Wow. I can't believe i could get this room for only 300k / nights (without breakfast) The room was very spacious. The design is very modern and they also have a long sofa in their room. So maybe if you have a child, he can sleep at the sofa. The place also have a great location. Its located on Paskal Mall. There's a lot of restaurant so you don't have to worry. It also near from cibadak street, train station, market. I love this hotel. The staffs also very warm and friendly.

definisi hotel budget yang tidak asal asalan, kamar nya simple, tapi kebersihan dan perawatan nya cukup baik, meskipun kebersihan nya masih bisa ditingkatkan lagi, paling minus di ac lorong kamar yg pengap dan seperti bau rokok padahal saya pilih kamar no smoking, dan ac kamar dingin nya lama. overall memuaskan untuk diharga nya, semoga terus semakin membaik.

Lokasi strategis di dalam area 23 paskal, sangat nyaman. Bersih dan tidak berisik. Semua staff ramah, pelayanan bagus. Ada swimming pool meskipun tidak terlalu luas, view nya oke. Hotel terpuas selama di bandung. Hotelnya bersih. Ranjang enak. Seprei bersih putih. Handuk putih. Tv di kamar juga cukup besar. Di bawah ada mall paskal yang super lengkap. Breakfast nya lumayan lah, ada berbagai pilihan dan rasanya juga enak. Selama 3 hari 2 malam sy nyaman menginap di Yello Hotel. Bisa jd rekomendasi buat yg mau liburan ke Bandung.

Sebenernya lokasinya enak yah menyatu dengan mall paskalnya sendiri, dekat dengan tempat-tempat makan, cuma kalau mau keluar dari hotel kayanya agak mikir-mikir lagi, apalagi kalau weekend, buat keluar dari hotelnya itu ke pintu keluar parkir paskal antrinya panjang, cukup makan waktu...

First of all, the location is strategic, near to the malls and food stalls. The staff's service and hospitality was also good. My family and I almost had to whisper all the time if we want to talk to each other. For me, it is fatal for a hotel to have such rooms like that. Pls do consider to renovate your rooms entirely.

Lokasi hotel ditengah pusat keramaian Bandung, berada di mall dan pusat makanan, petugas hotel sangat helpfull dan perhatian, saat istri saya sakit, pihak hotel mengantar sampai RS, ditengah kemacetan, kami sangat terbantu. I stayed for 3 nights in here for business trip and it was an enjoyable stay. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The room is clean and neat. The location is just perfect, right next to Paskal 23, the current happening shopping mall. Definitely will come back again to this hotel.

Kasur nyaman. View kamar bagus, terutama dari lantai atas. Kamar dilengkapi daybed yang nyaman. AC dan air panas berfungsi dengan baik. Dilengkapi safe deposit box dan water heater. Kamar Superior tidak dilengkapi kulkas. Kebersihan kamar, kamar mandi, dan fasilitas hotel cukup baik. Sarapan cukup baik dan lezat, hanya saja tempat nya mungkin tidak akan mampu mengakomodir seluruh tamu hotel saat peak seasons. Kolam renang dengan ukuran tidak terlalu besar namun cukup. Terdapat konsol X-box yang dapat digunakan pada area bermain di depan lobby lantai 4. Akses langsung ke mall dan Paskal Food Market, which is so convenient. Stasiun Bandung terletak tidak jauh dari hotel, dan mampu ditempuh dengan berjalan kaki. Over all, I had a good experience to stay at this hotel.

Cari hotel yang bisa langsung akses ke mall, ini bisa jadi pilihan kalian. Utk parkir di basement dan banyak slot parkir jadi ga perlu khawatir kehabisan parkir. Semua staf ramah. Fasilitas kamar ya ada : - AC - TV - wifi - Handuk - toileters - water heater - Coffe maker Utk fasilitas hotelnya : - Restaurant - Kolam renang Sarannya : Beberapa menu sarapan rasanya kurang pas, ada yang terlalu asin & ada yg terlalu manis.

3 important minus points 1. The pillow really makes my neck really sore. instead of giving 2 pillows per person but only one is bad. it's better to give 2 pillows, one thick and one thin, so customers have a choice of what suits them. the other pillow is really bad, it's better not to give it. 2. The hotel mattress is very soft and makes your waist really sore. I personally don't really like the mattress. but this is personal taste. 3. Please pay attention to the quality of the towels again. it looks a bit dirty until I ask for a replacement. try to have a service life and replace a new one within a certain period of time. pluses: the location is very strategic where next to it is a mall. and many food choices around the hotel. but because the mattress and pillows don't suit me, maybe this is the first and last visit for me.

One-liner: Good hotel can improve it's tourist services (i.e., day trip) Would we stay here again: Yes! What we like: Good hotel, was close to the station, food market and shopping area. Room was clean and tidy, facilitations (pool, reception, laundry) were good. It exceeded our expectations by a small bit. Improvement: Tourist services were far more expensive then booking it somewhere else. So in case you want to book a day trip do not do it at the hotel.

Dapat pengalaman menginap yg overall memuaskan. Mulai dari lobby (lantai 4) yg instagrammable, tempat bermain anak, kolam renang yg lumayan, smoking room umum, smoking di kamar, ruang rapat dengan wifi yg lumayan, dll. Pertama kali coba staycation di sini, Hotel nya bagus,, berada di pusat kota. Fasilitasnya juga lengkap, mau ke mall tinggal turun kebawah. Selain itu dekat juga ke stasiun kereta. Cari makan keluar hotel pun banyak pilihan nya. Pokonya rekomendasi banget buat nginep disini.

I was staying in the hotel for 2 days 1 night on a business trip. The hotel itself is inside a commercial complex and it can be spotted easily due to the unique hotel building. The service was a good one, breakfast included, swimming pools is on the outside. Under the hotel is a mall, so you can grab a food and go shopping just a few steps. Makanannya enak ...bersatu sama mall...bawa anak bisa main, ibunya belanja tenang ğŸ˜ ada kolam renang jg...hotel bintang 3 rasa bintang 4. Servicenya excellent lah...ramah2. oh iya dikasih Snack pula di kamar...luar biasa...best lah. Salesnya mau di wa mlm2 demi memenuhi permintaan yg segambreng.

Konsep hotelnya unik, lokasinya strategis, karena melekat dgn mall, lalu di belakangnya ada food market. Gampang cari tempat makan. Kamarnya nyaman, ada sofa buat rebahan santai. Di lobby tersedia fasilitas Xbox, dan permainan lainnya. Mantaaap

I decided to stay in this Hotel for a short family trip with my young niece & nephews together with my parents. It's so hard to satisfy all of them, but they really enjoyed their time in this Hotel. The hotel is attached to one of a new & also the best Mall so far in Bandung. You name it, they have it! We went down to the Mall several times, it was so convenient with big brand stores, favourite chained coffee shops, various restaurants/stalls, and a cinema. The Hotel has an outdoor pool on the 4th floor, it was windy + icy-cold. They also provide a game corner with game apps in tablets, a table football, and an Xbox-One with lots of pirated games opened for 24 hours. However, they turned off the AC in the midnight. The room was okay, simple and clean. They have everything you need except for a hair-dryer. We had to call the slow response reception to borrow a limited hair-dryer. And they would call you back when someone else needs it, even in the morning. It was quite disturbing. Other than that, they're perfect! There are so many interesting Hotels in Bandung, this is one of them.

My friend took care of the reservation and we stayed for a night. Located on the 8th level, our room was quite spacious with the typical YELLO-style interior. I love the chaise lounge positioned next to floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the north, allowing me to sip my morning tea while enjoying an amazing mountain view in the morning, which was great. The bathroom was well-lit and neat. However, we did not find a hairdryer. The shower's water pressure was quite weak. The drainage was also somehow clogged. It took time before all the water was sucked up. Also, we did not find Q-tips in the bathroom. Having visited YELLO Jakarta previously, there were certainly things we didn't find on the premises. The hotel did not have a gym, but it had a swimming pool instead. There was a game corner with an Xbox and a fussball table. They did have a Just Dance installed on the Xbox but the space for dancing was a bit too small. Location-wise, the hotel offers quick access to Paskal 23 Shopping Mall. Personally, I do not really like the shopping mall but my friend kinda likes it and perhaps that's the reason why he booked the hotel. However, the access allows us to easily find restaurants to eat. The hotel is also about 15 minutes away from the Bandung Station. The hotel gave complimentary parking vouchers for guests. However, as we were about to leave the complex, the parking lady petulantly told us that we had to provide 2 vouchers, asking us to go back to the hotel and ask for an additional voucher, otherwise, we had to pay for the parking fee. Meanwhile, there were cars lining behind us and the argument eventually took place. We had to pay since my friend had a train at 4.10 (it was 3.30 in the afternoon). I forgot the exact name but it was something ending with -no (I don't know, Trisno or something?). The staff who gave me the parking voucher was a man wearing glasses with mid-length hair slicked back. He gave me one voucher and we did not know that we had to provide two vouchers at the parking booth. He was at the lobby around midnight (Monday, July 21 2019). In fact, there was a lady protesting about the water in her room and from what I heard, the water did not come out and she hadn't washed her hair for a couple days so yeah, she wasn't having it. We ended up paying for something we do believe should be free. My friend was really angry, calling the hotel to report the case. However, the staff handled the problem well and my friend got the refund eventually but still, what an unpleasant experience we had. Perhaps next time, the staff should be more careful.
